steps.text: Start the quest by interacting with the Ancient Tablet in ◀Tianqiu Valley▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Tianqiu_Valley▷'s ruins.
Unlock the secret of Tianqiu Valley
Collect the Light Actuators from the 3 nearby towers.
Defeat the ◀Treasure Hoarders▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Treasure_Hoarders▷
Collect the Treasure
3 ◀Luxurious Chests▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chests▷ will spawn, of which one will give 50 Primogems instead of the usual 10.
North Tower
Flame Torch Puzzle 1, First Floor. Triple-triangle. Shoot the upper-outermost torch, then shoot the bottom inner-most torch.
The nearby Exquisite Chest is unlocked after completing the challenge.
Flame Torch Puzzle 2, Second Floor. Assuming no Torches are lit:
The nearby Precious Chest is unlocked after completing the challenge.
Flame Torch Puzzle 3, Third Floor. Shoot all torches on the walls in any order. There are 2 on each side of the room for a total of 8 torches.
The nearby Luxurious Chest is unlocked after completing the challenge.
Once it's done, grab the Light Actuator by walking close to it (climbing up to the pedestal). Then, bring it to the center of the ruins.
Shoot any Torch (3 will be lit, one of them is between two unlit Torches).
Shoot one of the two remaining unlit Torches (4 will be lit).
Shoot the Torch (3 will be lit, one of them is between two lit Torches).
Shoot any Torch (2 will be lit).
Shoot the Torch not adjacent to the lit Torches (1 will be lit).
Shoot any Torch not adjacent to the lit Torch (2 will be lit).
Shoot the Torch adjacent to both of the lit Torches.
South Tower
Time-Trial Challenge, First Floor. Kill 4 enemies within 40 seconds. They are all empowered by an Electro infusion stone nearby that can be destroyed to lower their defense.
<img:rock_shield_hilichurl_guard> ◀Rock Shield Hilichurl Guard▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Rock_Shield_Hilichurl_Guard▷ ×3
<img:electro_hilichurl_shooter> ◀Electro Hilichurl Shooter▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electro_Hilichurl_Shooter▷ ×1
Time-Trial Challenge, Second Floor. Kill 5 enemies within 60 seconds. They are all empowered by a Pyro infusion stone nearby that can be destroyed to lower their defense.
<img:large_pyro_slime> ◀Large Pyro Slime▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Large_Pyro_Slime▷ ×2
<img:pyro_hilichurl_shooter> ◀Pyro Hilichurl Shooter▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Pyro_Hilichurl_Shooter▷ ×1
<img:pyro_hilichurl_grenadier> ◀Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Pyro_Hilichurl_Grenadier▷ ×1
<img:hilichurl_berserker> ◀Hilichurl Berserker▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hilichurl_Berserker▷ ×1
Time-Trial Challenge, Third Floor. Kill 5 enemies within 60 seconds. They are all empowered by a Cryo infusion stone nearby that can be destroyed to lower their defense.
<img:hydro_abyss_mage> ◀Hydro Abyss Mage▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hydro_Abyss_Mage▷ ×1
<img:large_cryo_slime> ◀Large Cryo Slime▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Large_Cryo_Slime▷ ×1
<img:large_hydro_slime> ◀Large Hydro Slime▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Large_Hydro_Slime▷ ×1
<img:cryo_hilichurl_shooter> ◀Cryo Hilichurl Shooter▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cryo_Hilichurl_Shooter▷ ×2
Once it's done, grab the Light Actuator by walking close to it (climbing up to the pedestal). Then bring it to the center of the ruins.
An Exquisite Chest spawns after completing each challenge.
West Tower
Time-Trial Challenge. Reach the top-floor and grab the Light Actuator component within 60 seconds. (Parkour Challenge)
An Exquisite Chest is located on the topmost platform.

The ◀Wind Catcher▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wind_Catcher▷ gadget, ◀Geo Traveler▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Traveler_(Geo)▷'s ◀Elemental Skill▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Starfell_Sword▷, ◀Keqing▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Keqing▷'s held ◀Elemental Skill▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stellar_Restoration▷, ◀Venti▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Venti▷'s ◀1st Ascension Passive▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Embrace_of_Winds▷, and ◀Kaedehara Kazuha▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Kaedehara_Kazuha▷'s held ◀Elemental Skill▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chihayaburu▷, etc. can be used to reach the higher platforms.
Bring the Light Actuator to the center of the ruins.
